        Returns:
        InputStream of file opened.

      • closeInputStream

        public static void closeInputStream(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                             throws ShellException
        Close an inputStream. If inputStream provided is System.in or null, it will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - InputStream to be closed.
        Throws:
        ShellException - If inputStream cannot be closed successfully.

      • closeOutputStream

        public static void closeOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                              throws ShellException
        Close an outputStream. If outputStream provided is System.out or null, it will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - OutputStream to be closed.
        Throws:
        ShellException - If outputStream cannot be closed successfully.

                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a list of lines based on the given InputStream.
        Parameters:
        input - InputStream containing arguments from System.in or FileInputStream
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If something wrong with the InputStream input
